snippet: Financial institutions should be required to explain their overdraft programs and include complete pricing information about different overdraft options.
abstract: Editorial urges the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau to require financial institutions to clearly explain their debit card overdraft programs and to include complete pricing information; urges bureau to also require that fees be reasonable and proportional to the amount of the overdraft.
lead_paragraph: Financial institutions should be required to explain their overdraft programs and include complete pricing information about different overdraft options.
